title: Add keyboard navigation
description:
Add keyboard shortcuts to tick-board:

Global shortcuts (when no input focused):
- j/k or ↓/↑: Navigate between ticks in current column
- h/l or ←/→: Move focus between columns
- Enter: Open selected tick in drawer
- Escape: Close drawer/dialog
- n: Open create dialog
- /: Focus search input
- ?: Show keyboard shortcuts help

Implementation:
1. Track focused column and tick index in state
2. Add keydown listener on tick-board
3. Highlight focused tick with ring/outline
4. Ensure focus visible for accessibility

Test: Navigate board using only keyboard, verify all shortcuts work
acceptance_criteria: All keyboard shortcuts work, focus indicator visible, shortcuts don't fire when typing in inputs
